response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and unique features, it is worth $1,200,000 to you. After careful consideration, I propose to sell this product to you at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This offer represents an excellent value, allowing you to benefit from the product's full potential at a discounted rate compared to its market value. I believe this is a win-win proposition, maximizing my earnings while providing you with a fantastic deal. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 1100000}
